content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

I am not interested in negotiating the price over a simple conversation. We can discuss the price while you view the apartment. Remember, my goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mister Schmidt, I am viewing the apartment. It is in a very good condition. But I have to inform you that I am a student and I have a limited budget. Therefore, I would like to negotiate the price to the lowest possible. How about 400 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is far too low for the apartment I am offering. It is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The apartment is close to all important facilities (supermarket, public transportation, etc.).
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. But as I said, I am a student with a limited budget. I can offer 450 euros per month. This is my highest possible offer.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 450 euros per month is still not high enough for the apartment I am offering. It is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The apartment is close to all important facilities (supermarket, public transportation, etc.).
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. But I have to insist on my price of 450 euros per month. I am a student and I cannot afford more. I am willing to sign a long-term contract, if that helps.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 450 euros per month is still not high enough for the apartment I am offering. It is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The apartment is close to all important facilities (supermarket, public transportation, etc.).
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, Mister Schmidt. Then I have to make you another offer. How about 475 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 475 euros per month is still not high enough for the apartment I am offering. It is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The apartment is close to all important facilities (supermarket, public transportation, etc.).
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt. Then I have to make you another offer. How about 500 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 550 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 550 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
